name: The Deadline Before Christmas
description:
A frantic festive factory game!

Work together as up to 1-4 of santa's elves to help repair santa's workshop to create toys for all the good girls and boys. 

  • Lay Conveyors to send items to painting, stuffing and wrapping machines
  • Control the floor plan to help other elves get to work and create enough toys on the Deadline Before Christmas

NOTE: works best with an XBOX controller, PS4/other xinput can work but controls are jumbled. 

A participant in UTS games showcase.

Game created by these fine folks:

Dexter Cave, Caleb O'Reilly, Sam Alexandroplous, Sharon Liu, Zac Casimatis
